rows.label: tev021801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev021801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Vera for her opinion of xenoforms.

rows.label: tev021801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Vera about recent developments.

rows.label: tev021801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Vera for her opinion of the Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Vera about the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Vera about the xenoforms living in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00001
rows.name:
After the horrible fate that befell Earth,
some humans have come to resent all xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00002
rows.name:
But as a scientist, I am always eager to see examples
of lifeforms who acquired intelligence through a
different evolutionary path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00003
rows.name:
From what I understand, they've found ruins throughout
the planet that suggest intelligent life existed here
previously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00004
rows.name:
I always relish opportunities to encounter the unknown.
What about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00007
rows.name:
I may be a rough-and-tumble BLADE, but believe it
or not, I was once studying to be a biologist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00008
rows.name:
When I was a student, I was always off on one
cross-country trip after another, doing fieldwork with
my professor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00009
rows.name:
We traversed jungles and deserts hunting for rare
animals and fossils...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00010
rows.name:
And when we'd find one, we'd jump up and down with
glee. Like children! Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00011
rows.name:
My professor stayed behind on Earth, but I know he'd
have been thrilled to come here and see all the
unidentified species on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00019
rows.name:
I spoke with Tatsu, one of the native people discovered
by Elma's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00020
rows.name:
It was quite perplexing. These Nopon seem rather...
physically weak, let's say. And they don't strike me as
being particularly intelligent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00021
rows.name:
And yet, they have somehow managed to survive on
this inhospitable world. I wonder how?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00022
rows.name:
As such ideal targets of predation, one would assume
they'd be wiped out quite easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00023
rows.name:
There must be some reason why they're suited to this
environment. It's a puzzle I look forward to solving![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00038
rows.name:
From their appearance, I would conjecture that they
evolved from some sort of amphibious creature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00039
rows.name:
But they don't seem to require an aquatic environment,
and their behavior has little in common with Earth's
amphibians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00040
rows.name:
I wonder what evolutionary path could have led to the
acquisition of such incredible intelligence?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00041
rows.name:
What fantastic research subjects they make!
I'm thinking I should live on this ship of theirs for
a while in order to study them more closely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00042
rows.name:
It would also give me an opportunity to study some of
the rare indigen specimens they've collected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00057
rows.name:
Considering the astronomical odds against the evolution
of intelligent life, one wouldn't expect the universe to
contain many other species with humanlike smarts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00058
rows.name:
And yet, we've encountered numerous intelligent
xenoforms that each possess unique characteristics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00059
rows.name:
However, as varied as they appear, cellular analysis
reveals numerous common factors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00060
rows.name:
I may be an atheist, but I can understand how others
would turn to the idea of an omnipotent god
distributing life and intelligence throughout the cosmos.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00061
rows.name:
Heh. But if I am to be a true biologist, I suppose I
need to search for a more rational explanation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Vera about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00062
rows.name:
I'd been trying to get some vigent blood for a while,
and that Orleron fellow just brought me some as a
present.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00063
rows.name:
But apparently his gift came with certain...expectations.
He got quite assertive and pushy afterward, saying he
would make me happy if I would only be with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00064
rows.name:
If the fool thinks such behavior will make me fall in love
with him, he couldn't be more wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00067
rows.name:
I'd been trying to get some vigent blood for a while,
and that Orleron fellow just brought me some as a
present.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00068
rows.name:
But then he placed a gentle hand on my arm and said
he would do anything for me. It was...uncomfortable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00069
rows.name:
If he thinks such behavior will make me fall in love
with him, he couldn't be more wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Vera if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00070
rows.name:
Are you familiar with the waste-processing units over in
the industrial district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00071
rows.name:
I hear there's a woman down there named Liza who
handles everything by using the special properties of
the Zaruboggan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00072
rows.name:
I only recently learned of their special purification
abilities myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00073
rows.name:
But it's quite the brainstorm to use them for our
waste-management needs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021801_MSG00074
rows.name:
With enough ideas like that, don't you think that
maybe we humans could get a little bit closer with
the others on this ship?[ST:wait ]
